member.name: T:AtomicTorch.GameEngine.Common.Client.MonoGame.UI.BaseUserControl
member.summary: Stub type for WPF. Please note: this class cannot be abstract, otherwise XAML previewer won't work.

member.name: M:AtomicTorch.GameEngine.Common.Client.MonoGame.UI.TextureBrush.DestroyImmediately
member.summary: Destroys the brush and the texture. Please be very careful when calling this method - ensure that the texture resource and the texture brush are not used anymore.
